s0103: In Duke Ding's ninth year, Yang Hu was defeated, fled to Qi.
s0104: At this time Confucius was fifty years old.
s0105: Gong Shan Bu Niu rebelled against the Ji family with Bi, sent someone to summon Confucius.
s0106: Confucius had followed the Way for a long time, gently without being tested, none could employ him, said: 'Perhaps Zhou Wen and Wu arose from Feng and Hao to become kings, now Bi though small, perhaps I can manage it!'
s0108: Zi Lu was displeased, stopped Confucius.
s0109: Confucius said: 'Those who summon me, is it for nothing?
s0110: If they employ me, it will be an Eastern Zhou!'
s0111: Yet in the end he did not go.
s0112: After this Duke Ding appointed Confucius as Zhongdu magistrate, in one year the four directions all emulated him.
s0113: From Zhongdu magistrate he became Director of Works, from Director of Works became Grand Minister of Justice.
s0114: In Duke Ding's tenth year spring, made peace with Qi.
s0115: Summer, Qi minister Li Chu spoke to Duke Jing saying: 'Lu employs Kong Qiu, this threatens Qi.'
s0116: Thus sent an envoy to inform Lu of a friendly meeting, meeting at Jiagu.
s0117: Duke Ding of Lu was about to go with a chariot in friendship.
s0118: Confucius acted as prime minister, said: 'I have heard that those who have civil affairs must have military preparations, those who have military affairs must have civil preparations.
s0119: In ancient times when feudal lords left their territory, they must have complete officials accompany them.
s0120: Please prepare left and right marshals.'
s0123: Met the Qi duke at Jiagu, established altar positions, earthen steps three levels, met with meeting etiquette, bowed and yielded and ascended.
s0124: The offering and toasting rituals completed, Qi officials hurried forward saying: 'Please perform the music of the four directions.'
s0126: Thus banners, yak tails, feathers, halberds, spears, swords, shields, drums, and shouting arrived.
s0127: Confucius hurried forward, ascended the steps without completing one level, raised his sleeve and spoke: 'Our two lords make a friendly meeting, why is barbarian music here!
s0129: The officials repelled them, they did not leave, then looked left and right at Yan Ying and Duke Jing.
s0130: Duke Jing was ashamed in heart, waved them away.
s0131: After a while, Qi officials hurried forward saying: 'Please perform inner palace music.'
s0133: Actors and dwarfs performed plays and advanced.
s0134: Confucius hurried forward, ascended the steps without completing one level, said: 'Common fellows who deceive feudal lords, their crime deserves execution!
s0136: The officials applied the law, hands and feet separated.
s0137: Duke Jing was fearful and moved, knew righteousness was inferior, returned and greatly feared, told his ministers: 'Lu assists its lord with the way of gentlemen, but you alone teach me the way of barbarians, causing me to offend the Lu lord, what can be done?'
s0138: The officials advanced replying: 'Gentlemen apologize for mistakes with sincerity, petty men apologize for mistakes with words.
s0139: If your lordship regrets it, then apologize with sincerity.'
s0140: Thus the Qi duke returned the invaded Lu territories of Yun, Wen Yang, and Gui Yin to apologize for the offense.
s0141: In Duke Ding's thirteenth year summer, Confucius spoke to Duke Ding: 'Ministers should not store armor, great officers should not have cities of one hundred mou.'
s0142: Had Zhong You serve as Ji family magistrate, about to destroy the three cities.
s0143: Thus the Shusun family first destroyed Hou.
s0144: The Ji family was about to destroy Bi, Gong Shan Bu Niu and Shusun Zhe led the Bi people to attack Lu.
s0145: The duke and the three families entered the Ji family palace, ascended Wu Zi's terrace.
s0146: The Bi people attacked them, could not conquer, entered and reached the duke's side.
s0147: Confucius ordered Shen Ju Xu and Yue Yi to descend and attack them, the Bi people fled north.
s0148: The state people pursued them, defeated them at Gu Mie.
s0149: The two men fled to Qi, thus destroyed Bi.
s0150: About to destroy Cheng, Duke Lian Chu Fu told Meng Sun: 'Destroying Cheng, the Qi people will certainly reach the north gate.
s0151: Moreover Cheng is the Meng family's protective barrier, without Cheng there is no Meng family.
